articles.title: DPRK-related Letter and Answer Distributed as UNSC Official Document
articles.content:
DPRK-related Letter and Answer Distributed as UNSC Official Document 
						
 Pyongyang, June 20 (KCNA) -- A letter addressed to the president of the UN Security Council by the permanent representative of the DPRK at the UN as regards the grave situation prevailing on the Korean Peninsula and an answer given by a spokesman of the DPRK Foreign Ministry to the question put by KCNA (issued on June 4) were distributed as the UNSC official document S/2010/294 on June 17.

articles.title: Floral Basket to DPRK Consulate General in Shenyang
articles.content:
Floral Basket to DPRK Consulate General in Shenyang
 Pyongyang, June 20 (KCNA) -- The family of Zhang Weihua, Chinese anti-Japanese revolutionary martyr, sent a basket of flowers to the DPRK consulate general in Shenyang on June 15 on the occasion of the 46th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea.

articles.title: Tribute Paid to Fallen Soviet Army Soldiers
articles.content:
Tribute Paid to Fallen Soviet Army Soldiers
 Pyongyang, June 20 (KCNA) -- The State Academic Igor Moiseyev Dance Company of Russia headed by Director Elena Scherbakova laid a wreath before the Liberation Tower on Sunday.
					 The guests laid a wreath in the name of the dance company before the tower and paid silent tribute to the memory of the fallen Soviet Army soldiers.

articles.title: Han Sang Ryol Preaches Sermon at Pongsu Church
articles.content:
Han Sang Ryol Preaches Sermon at Pongsu Church
 Pyongyang, June 20 (KCNA) -- Rev. Han Sang Ryol, a pro-reunification champion of south Korea, attended Sunday service at Pongsu Church on the occasion of the 10th anniversary of the June 15 joint declaration. 
					 Present there were officials of the Christian Federation of Korea and believers of Pongsu Church.
					
					 Chief Rev. Son Hyo Sun of Pongsu Church officiated at the service.
					
					 Rev. Han preached sermon titled "Cross for one-body peace, reunification and peace".
					
					 He said that the June 15 joint declaration represents peace and reunification and whoever is devout Christian should make active contribution to achieving national cooperation and bringing the day of victory by rejecting cooperation with outsiders.

articles.title: Anniversary of Start of Work at WPK Celebrated
articles.content:
Anniversary of Start of Work at WPK Celebrated
Pyongyang, June 20 (KCNA) -- Performances were given at theatres here and in local areas on Saturday to celebrate the 46th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 Performances were given here by artistes of the national art groups.
					
					 The artistes of the Orchestra of the Yun I Sang Music Institute gave a performance at the Yun I Sang Concert Hall. Put on the stage were violin solo "We Will Be Loyal down through Generations", female solo "Korea, I will Glorify Thee", an immortal classic masterpiece, violin ensemble "Our Father Marshal Kim Jong Il" and other numbers.
					
					 The Art Squad of the Central Committee of the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League performed at the plaza of the Party Founding Memorial Tower. Numbers including narration and small chorus "Long Live the Workers' Party of Korea", mixed duet and small chorus "Party Is Embrace of the General", male quintet "His Ideal", choral recital of poem and small chorus "Appearance of Korea" touched heartstrings of the audience.
					
					 Actors and actresses of the Pyongyang Circus presented physical acrobatics "Trampoline Rotation", "Balancing Stunt", "Strength Talent" and "Diverse Flight", animal circus "Bears' Rope jumping" and other numbers at the Pyongyang Circus Theater, pleasing the citizens demonstrating their merits in on-going great drive and instilling optimism into them.
					
					 On the same day music and dance performances were held at theatres in local areas including North Phyongan, South Hwanghae, South Hamgyong and Kangwon Provinces.

articles.title: Schoolchildren's Performance Given
articles.content:
Schoolchildren's Performance Given
Pyongyang, June 20 (KCNA) -- A performance of art group members of the Mangyongdae Schoolchildren's Palace was given on Saturday to celebrate the 46th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 Put on the stage were such colorful numbers as orchestra and chorus "Korea, I Will Glorify Thee", a famous classical masterpiece, instrumental ensemble for pizzicato "I Answered My Younger Sister's Question", song of triplets "I Am a Flower Bud", piano solo "The General Star Beyond the Clouds", light music "We Are the Happiest in the World" and male group singing and chorus "Let Us the Reserve of the Songun Revolution Advance".
					
					 Performers highly praised the immortal exploits of Kim Jong Il who makes ceaseless forced march for on-the-spot guidance for a thriving nation and the future, sparing nothing for the younger generation. They also gave impressive depiction of the schoolchildren happily growing up under the care of the mother party.
					
					 The performance was enjoyed by Ri Yong Su, department director of the Workers' Party of Korea Central Committee, Ri Yong Chol, first secretary of the Central Committee of the youth league, officials concerned and school youth and children in Pyongyang.

articles.title: Memorial Tower Visited by Endless Stream of People
articles.content:
Memorial Tower Visited by Endless Stream of People
 Pyongyang, June 20 (KCNA) -- The Party Founding Memorial Tower is visited by daily average of at least 1 000 people on the occasion of the 46th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 The tower is a historical monument for glorifying for all ages the exploits performed by President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il for the realization of the cause of Juche-based Party building and demonstrating the greatness and invincibility of the WPK.
					
					 It has a hammer, a sickle and a writing brush depicting workers, farmers and intellectuals making up the WPK, a round band symbolizing a single-minded unity of the leader, the party and the  popular masses and a platform representing the history of the WPK that has grown from the roots of the Down-with-Imperialism Union.
					
					 Over 4.6 million servicepersons and working people of various circles, school youth and children, overseas compatriots and foreigners visited the tower for the past 15 years since its completion.

articles.title: History Society Accuses US of Provoking War Aggression
articles.content:
History Society Accuses US of Provoking War Aggression
 Pyongyang, June 20 (KCNA) -- The History Society of the DPRK issued a statement Sunday condemning the U.S. imperialists for dividing Korea under the cloak of the United Nations and igniting the Korean war of aggression by  fabricating the "UN Forces" on the lapse of 60 years since the outbreak of the Korean War.
					 The statement said:
					
					 As the defeat of the Japanese imperialists was drawing close, the U.S. imperialists regarded it as a crucial moment to realize its strategy for dominating Korea which had been making for centuries and initiated a scenario for partitioning Korea and put it into practice, occupying the area south of the 38th Parallel of the north latitude without shedding blood.
					
					 The statement cited facts to prove that the U.S. wild ambition to dominate Korea by using the UN had already been worked out.
					
					 It went on: The U.S. torpedoed the work of the USSR-U.S. Joint Commission in September, 1947 and openly declared that the Korean issue would be referred to the UN General Assembly. The U.S. cooked up a resolution on it and passed it through the UN General Assembly by using its hand-raising machine.
					
					 On June 25, 1950, the U.S. imperialists finally started all-out armed invasion against the DPRK by instigating the Syngman Rhee puppet army. 
					
					 After igniting the war, the U.S. imperialists lost no time to start an operation toward the UN to escalate the war of aggression according to the scenario already worked out by them. 
					
					 On the same day, Truman quickly held a meeting of bosses of the military administration at a state guest house to discuss armed intervention and issued an order on providing ammunition aid to south Korea and mobilizing naval and air forces. 
					
					 The U.S. had a meeting of the UN Security Council held on June 27 so that it adopted an illegal "resolution" recommending the UN member states to assist "the Republic of Korea" in repulsing the military attack and defending global peace and security in this region.
					
					 As seen above, the U.S. actions always preceded the adoption of UN resolutions. The U.S. did not follow UN resolutions but it had the practice of "approving" the U.S. acts of aggression later. This "systematic procedure" continued in the whole period of the war. 
					
					 On July 7, 1950, the Korean War was fully regarded as an international dispute by a resolution of the UNSC. The UN thus placed its flag in the hands of the aggressors, becoming a belligerent party in Korea. 
					
					 The United States finally formed the illegal "UN Forces" including its 15 satellite states by means of all sorts of appeasement, threat and blackmail. 
					
					 The aim of the "UN Forces" was to cover up the true colors of the U.S. as a war provoker and aggressor and transfer part of the heavy burden of the war to its satellite states. But, the "UN Forces" were, in essence, the U.S. forces. 
					
					 When landing in south Korea under UN blue helmets the U.S. imperialist aggressors hurled into the war one-third of its army, one-fifth of its air force and majority of its Pacific Fleet in a bid to realize its scenario for military occupation of the whole of Korea. They committed all sorts of crimes unprecedented in human history such as barbarous massacre and destruction, stunning the world people. 
					
					 What was more serious was that they committed unprecedentedly brutal massacres putting the atrocities of the Hitler Nazi clique into the shade under the name of the UN. 
					
					 More than half a century has passed since the ceasefire on the Korean Peninsula but the U.S. imperialist aggression forces' presence in south Korea under "UN Forces" blue helmets has not come to an end and the peninsula is still in the state of ceasefire, the statement noted, and continued: 
					
					 The abnormal state of "DPRK-UN confrontation" which was deliberately created six decades back is still going on. 
					
					 Nothing can hide the truth of history. It has already been brought to light that the signboard of the UN is nothing but window dressing to hide the true nature of the U.S. and the "UN Command" is, in fact, is a bogus mechanism for concealing the actual belligerent relations while being outside the UN. 
					
					 The present reality proves that there is no justification for this ghost like "UN Command" to exist any longer and its final disbandment is inevitable. 
					
					 The U.S. seeks to reorganize on an expansion basis the "UN Command" which should have been disorganized long ago according to the UN resolution, while stepping up its hostile moves against the DPRK. This is a criminal act of challenging the sacred mission of UN and human conscience. 
					
					 The U.S. should stop the acts of threatening peace and security on the Korean Peninsula, falsifying the truth of history, immediately disband the "UN Command" and replace the Korean Armistice Agreement by a peace treaty. 
					
					 The U.S. should make a bold option to fulfill its responsibility before the world and mankind, bearing in mind that the longer it maintains the "UN Command," the leftover of the Cold War, and the further it strengthens, paying no heed to the voices of the Korean people and all other people of the world demanding its removal from the Korean Peninsula, it will only precipitate its international isolation and destruction.

articles.title: S. Korean Public Security Authorities' Suppression under Fire
articles.content:
S. Korean Public Security Authorities' Suppression under Fire
 Pyongyang, June 20 (KCNA) -- Members of the south Korean civic and public organizations including the National Council for the Promotion of the Reunification by Federal Formula, the Solidarity for Progress and the People's Solidarity for the Repeal of the "National Security Law" held a press conference in Seoul on June 17 to denounce the puppet public security authorities for their dastardly suppression racket.
					 Speakers at the press conference recalled that at dawn on June 14 the public security authorities arrested members of the national council.
					
					 They noted that the security authorities have kept two of them in custody in an "anti-communist section room" in Seoul and investigated them on suspicion of "forming and joining in enemy-benefiting organization", "producing and distributing materials benefiting enemies", etc. 
					
					 Such moves are prompted by the south Korean authorities' intention to reverse the situation by dint of the "National Security Law" amid the people's rising criticism of their driving the inter-Korean relations to the brink of war with the case of sinking of warship "Cheonan" as a momentum, they held. 
					
					 Saying that they would conduct a widespread struggle with the people to get the "NSL" repealed, they urged the authorities to immediately stop all sorts of intrigues.

articles.title: Probe into Truth behind Warship Case Urged in S. Korea
articles.content:
Probe into Truth behind Warship Case Urged in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, June 20 (KCNA) -- 43 civic and public organizations in south Korea including the People for Achieving Peace and Reunification, the Solidarity for Progress and the South Headquarters of the Pan-national Alliance for Korea's Reunification formed the Joint Action for Probing the Truth behind the Case of Warship Cheonan and Reunification on the Korean Peninsula on June 16. 
					 A press conference as regards its formation took place in Seoul on the same day. 
					
					 A press release read out there accused the "government" of pursuing the policy of confrontation with the DPRK based on unscientific "results of investigation" against the backdrop of growing foreign and domestic doubts and arguments about the sinking case. This has resulted in seriously threatening the peace of the Korean Peninsula, it deplored. 
					
					 It stressed that the organization would carry on its positive activities to probe the truth behind the warship case in scientific and objective way. 
					
					 Medical organizations including the Confederation of Public Health and Medial Organizations, the Council of Doctors for Realizing Humanitarianism and the Solidarity for Labor and Good Health in a joint statement on June 17 urged the south Korean authorities to immediately stop the suppression of the Citizen's Solidarity for Democratic Society. The solidarity sent a letter of protest to the UN Security Council in request of fair and objective discussion on the case of "Cheonan".
					
					 The joint action held a press conference in Seoul on June 17 at which it condemned the U.S. imperialists and the puppet group for their confab on applying international sanctions against the DPRK over the case.

articles.title: Just Cause of Korean People Supported by Britain Party
articles.content:
Just Cause of Korean People Supported by Britain Party
 Pyongyang, June 20 (KCNA) -- The 5th Congress of the Communist Party of Great Britain (Marxist-Leninist) held in London on June 12 expressed full support for the just cause of the Korean people.
					 A resolution adopted there reconfirmed the party's principled and unconditional support for the DPRK.
					
					 It noted that the DPRK has achieved great successes one after another in socialist construction, in developing the national economy, in particular.
					
					 The DPRK has also registered great successes in not only developing economy but improving the standard of people's living. Its successful launch of satellite Kwangmyongsong-2 and the successful 2nd underground nuclear test, in particular, resulted in beefing up its nuclear deterrent for self-defence, it said.
					
					 Reaffirming the party's principled stand that it is the legitimate sovereign right of the DPRK to keep and bolster nuclear deterrent for self-defence as it has been exposed to nuclear threat constantly posed by the U.S. imperialists while keeping the southern land of the Korean Peninsula under their control, the resolution went on:
					
					 Our party fully supports the just proposal of the DPRK for replacing the armistice agreement with a peace agreement and assures that it would make efforts to stir up the atmosphere for support and solidarity with the proposal among workers and organizations for peace against war in Britain.
					
					 This year marks the 10th anniversary of the establishment of diplomatic ties between Britain and the DPRK.
					
					 Our party will exert efforts to positively develop the friendship and cultural exchanges between the two peoples, between workers in particular, and bring the British progressive people to the better knowledge of the DPRK.
					
					 Our party will widely conduct information service by mobilizing various means and methods to let British people easily know about the reality of socialist Korea and its successes and stand and wage solidarity activities to win many more friends of the DPRK.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Lauded by Finland and Myanmar's Figures
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Lauded by Finland and Myanmar's Figures
Pyongyang, June 20 (KCNA) -- Statements were released by figures of Finland and Myanmar on the occasion of the 46th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 The director of the "Kominform" Company of Finland in a statement on June 9 said that Kim Jong Il has fully displayed his traits as the great leader of the Party and people with his outstanding political caliber and the love for the people while working in the C.C., the WPK. He praised Kim Jong Il as the great elder statesman who strengthened and developed the WPK into an invincible revolutionary party.
					
					 Kim Jong Il, supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, made sure that the army has creditably discharged its mission as the driving force of socialist construction and defender of the country and the nation, he said, adding that the Songun policy is the most original and successful political mode in the world political history.
					
					 U Than Tun, deputy director general of the Union of Myanmar Economic Holdings Limited, in a statement on June 13 noted that the works of Kim Jong Il serve as great immortal programmes which guarantee the sure victory of the popular masses' cause of independence as they give scientific solution to the theoretical and practical issues arising in improving and strengthening the party building and activities as required by the developing historical circumstances and the times.
					
					 The WPK has led to victory the Korean people in the struggle to bring about a new turn in accomplishing the cause of Korea's reunification and dynamically shaped the destiny and future of the country and the nation under the seasoned and tested leadership of Kim Jong Il, he noted.

articles.title: NDC Spokesman's Statement Supported by Pakistani Groups
articles.content:
NDC Spokesman's Statement Supported by Pakistani Groups
Pyongyang, June 20 (KCNA) -- The Pakistan Organization for Afro-Asian People's Solidarity, the Pakistan Trade Union Federation, the Pakistan Peasants Committee, the Pakistan Committee for Supporting Korea's Reunification and the Pakistan-Korea Friendship Association made public a joint statement on June 12 in support of the statement released by a spokesman for the National Defence Commission of the DPRK.
					 The joint statement noted that the south Korean authorities have gone so impudent as to announce the "results of investigation" asserting that the warship "Cheonan" was sunken by a torpedo attack of the DPRK and have gone the lengths of crying out for "punishment" and "retaliation" and even the international community's "sanctions" on the DPRK under that pretext.
					
					 The case of warship "Cheonan's" sinking is a sheer fabrication cooked up by the south Korean authorities under the patronage and at the tacit connivance of the U.S., it said, adding that the DPRK is a righteous country and therefore, the military scheme against it is absolutely intolerable.
					
					 The General Kim Jong Il Peruvian Amicable Institute in its statement on May 29 denounced the south Korean puppet group for slandering the DPRK while letting loose ridiculous remarks that warship "Cheonan" was sunken by a "torpedo attack" of the DPRK.
					
					 Lee Myung Bak crying out for "retaliation" is a trickster and servant of the U.S., it said, expressing support for the principled stand of the DPRK.
					
					 The Bulgarian Group for the Study of the Juche Idea in its statement on June 14 expressed resentment against the campaign of the U.S. and the south Korean puppet authorities to shuffle off the responsibility for the warship sinking upon the DPRK. It asserted that the case occurred when the U.S.-south Korean joint military exercises were in the process. 
					
					 Meanwhile, a local government official of Sri Lanka who is the deputy director general of the Asian Regional Institute of the Juche Idea, W. A. Dumindwardane, secretary general of the Sri Lanka-People's Korea Friendship Association, and a secretary of the association, and Upali Bandara, secretary general of the Sri Lanka Society for Self-Reliance Studies, made public a joint statement on June 5 in denunciation of the anti-DPRK campaign of the U.S. and Lee Myung Bak group of traitors.

articles.title: Anniversary of Start of Work at WPK Observed in Various Countries
articles.content:
Anniversary of Start of Work at WPK Observed in Various Countries 
Pyongyang, June 20 (KCNA) -- Seminars on General Secretary Kim Jong Il's works were held in Pakistan, Russia and Sweden, a friendship meeting in France, a briefing and a lecture in Indonesia and a film show in Russia from June 11 to 15 on the occasion of the 46th anniversary of his start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 Speeches were made at the events.
					
					 The press secretary of a provincial committee of the Pakistan People's Party said that the work of Kim Jong Il "On Preserving the Juche Character and National Character of the Revolution and Construction" expounds the idea that it is imperative to preserve the Juche character and national character in order to accomplish socialism on the basis of historical experience and lesson drawn from the Korean revolution and the world revolution and sets forth tasks for realizing it in an all-round way.
					
					 The chief of the Swedish Group for the Study of the Juche Idea noted that Kim Jong Il made public the work "Socialism Is a Science" at a time when the world socialist movement was undergoing turns and twists, thus dealing blows at the imperialists and reactionaries and instilling confidence in victory of socialism into the progressive mankind.
					
					 The international secretary of the Central Committee of the French Revolutionary Communist League referred to the fact that while working in the WPK Central Committee Kim Jong Il has developed the WPK into the Juche-oriented revolutionary party guided by the Juche idea fathered by President Kim Il Sung and an invincible party which formed steel-strong unity and cohesion matchless with any other party.
					
					 The director of the Stroinmashuintorg Company of Russia said that it is the greatest miracle that the WPK has invariably held fast to the socialist banner even under the present complicated situation, stressing that Korean-style socialism is guaranteed by the invincible military power. 
					
					 The Korean film "The Party Founding Memorial Tower" was shown at the film show.

articles.title: 6.15 Joint Declaration Hailed in S. Africaa
articles.content:
6.15 Joint Declaration Hailed in S. Africa
 Pyongyang, June 20 (KCNA) -- The Mfumalanga Provincial Committee of the South African Communist Party and the South African Association for Friendship and Solidarity with Korean People made public a joint statement on June 12 on the occasion of the 10th anniversary of the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration.
					 The statement disclosed that the Lee Myung Bak group in south Korea is getting frantic in the anti-DPRK campaign while totally negating the inter-Korean declarations in collusion with outsiders.
					
					 It expressed support for the June 15 joint declaration hailed and supported by the Korean people, stressing that Korea should be reunified at all costs in the idea of the joint declaration.
					
					 The Switzerland-Korea Committee and the Swiss Group for the Study of the Juche Idea in a joint statement on June 13 noted that the process of the inter-Korean reconciliation and cooperation came to stagnation soon after the emergence of the pro-U.S. conservative Lee Myung Bak "government".
					
					 Noting that the north and the south of Korea stand in an all-out confrontation at present, it stressed that no challenges and obstructions of the forces hostile to the DPRK can ever stem the trend of the historic June 15 era of reunification.
